summary: This document is a cover email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting a final version of a letter regarding Federal Rule of Evidence 412, likely related to evidentiary issues in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email transmitting a final version of a Rule 412 letter from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Transmission of Rule 412 Letter
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a final version of a letter concerning Federal Rule of Evidence 412.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a cover email dated October 15, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
It transmits a final version of a letter regarding Federal Rule of Evidence 412.
The correspondence originates from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The subject matter indicates ongoing legal proceedings or preparations involving evidentiary rules related to victim or witness testimony.
